TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SuppressUnmanagedCodeSecurityAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SuppressUnmanagedCodeSecurityAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SuppressUnmanagedCodeSecurityAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 允许托管代码在不进行堆栈审核的情况下调用到非托管代码。

span.span: Allows managed code to call into unmanaged code without a stack walk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 特别小心使用此属性。Use this attribute with extreme care. 使用不当可造成安全漏洞。Incorrect use can create security weaknesses. 此特性可以应用于想要调入本机代码而不会产生运行时安全检查的性能损失，执行此操作时的方法。This attribute can be applied to methods that want to call into native code without incurring the performance loss of a run-time security check when doing so. 执行时调用非托管的代码在运行时，省略导致显著的性能收益堆栈审核。The stack walk performed when calling unmanaged code is omitted at run time, resulting in substantial performance savings. 类中使用此属性可将其应用到所有包含的方法。Using this attribute in a class applies it to all contained methods. 通常，每当托管的代码调用到非托管代码 （由到本机代码的 PInvoke 或 COM 互操作），则要求提供`UnmanagedCode`权限，以确保所有调用方拥有必要的权限以允许此操作。Generally, whenever managed code calls into unmanaged code (by PInvoke or COM interop into native code), there is a demand for the `UnmanagedCode` permission to ensure all callers have the necessary permission to allow this. 通过应用此显式特性，开发人员可以取消在运行时的需求。By applying this explicit attribute, developers can suppress the demand at run time. 开发人员必须负责确保转换到非托管代码充分受其他方式。The developer must take responsibility for assuring that the transition into unmanaged code is sufficiently protected by other means. 需求`UnmanagedCode`权限仍将发生在链接时。The demand for the `UnmanagedCode` permission will still occur at link time. 例如，如果函数的调用函数 B 函数和函数 B 将标有，函数 A 将检查的非托管代码权限在过程中在实时编译，但随后不在运行时。For example, if function A calls function B and function B is marked with , function A will be checked for unmanaged code permission during just-in-time compilation, but not subsequently during run time. 此属性才会生效时应用于 PInvoke 方法 （或包含 PInvoke 方法的类） 或通过其进行互操作调用接口的定义。This attribute is only effective when applied to PInvoke methods (or classes that contain PInvoke methods) or the definition of an interface through which interop calls will be made. 它将在所有其他上下文中被忽略。It will be ignored in all other contexts. 此属性可用于实现一个类，提供对通过非托管代码的系统资源的访问。This attribute is useful for implementing a class that provides access to system resources through unmanaged code. 有权访问非托管的代码的代码可以调用具有此属性可访问非托管的代码的类。Code that does not have permission to access unmanaged code can call a class with this attribute to access unmanaged code. 这是类的仅当使用此特性编写器已经是类的安全的类安全。This is only safe if the writer of the class with this attribute has programmed the class to be secure. 如果没有，此属性是危险的可以允许使用它来被误用的代码。If not, this attribute is dangerous and can allow the code that uses it to be misused. 这不是声明性安全特性，而常规属性 (它派生自，而不)。This is not a declarative security attribute, but a regular attribute (it derives from , not ).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数将所有字段初始化为其默认值。The default constructor initializes any fields to their default values.
